definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Check if this machine has a public IP address.
sentences.chinese: 檢測這臺機器是否有一個公網IP地址。

sentences.english: How do I log on the company's intranet?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何登陸公司的辦公網？

sentences.english: Click on add to create a new rule that will allow you to access from outside and introduce the data shown in the below image.
sentences.chinese: 點擊添加按鈕來加一個新的規則來允許你從公網連接。

sentences.english: This definition supports the use of ATM switches within both public and private networks.
sentences.chinese: 此定義支持了在公網和私網內ATM交換機的應用。

sentences.english: Click on add to create a new rule that will allow you to access outside and introduce the data shown in the below image.
sentences.chinese: 點擊添加按鈕來加一個新的規矩來容許你從公網連接。

sentences.english: A wireless public network is adopted as the solution to network buildup.
sentences.chinese: 該方案採用了無線公網組網的方式。

sentences.english: The Vista firewall allows you to choose whether you are on a public or private network.
sentences.chinese: Vista防火牆允許你選擇是在公網或者私網中。

sentences.english: In order for the public IP test to succeed a server instance must be started.
sentences.chinese: 爲了公網IP測試成功，必須開啓一個服務器實例。
